The U.S. state of Maine has four electoral votes , which it has awarded to the winner of its popular vote since 1968 . The state of North Carolina has always voted for the winning candidate in U.S. presidential elections . The state has never voted for a losing candidate since 1960 , and has voted for the Democratic candidate in every election except for 2008 , when it voted for John McCain . In 2020 , Joe Biden won the state with 54 percent of the popular vote , while Donald Trump received 45 percent .

The U.S. state of Oklahoma has always voted for the winner of the national presidential election , with the exception of the 1968 election . In that year , Oklahoma 's electors voted for Richard Nixon , who lost the popular vote to Hubert Humphrey . The state 's electoral votes have been won by the Democratic nominee in five elections and by the Republican nominee in thirteen elections . In the 2020 election , Joe Biden won Oklahoma with 54 percent of the popular vote , while Donald Trump received 45 percent . This was the first time since 1972 that a Democrat won Oklahoma .

It appears that the category of transportation equipment was the most expensive one for French households during this period , with an average of 6.3 billion euros spent each month .

As of the fourth quarter of 2021 , Ceuta was the Spanish province with the highest unemployment rate . The unemployment rate in this autonomous city reached 27 percent that quarter . In contrast , Ciudad Real had the lowest unemployment rate among all Spanish provinces at 16.2 percent .

In 2020 , most Hungarians would use their mobile phones to get in touch with their friends and family during Christmas . Only nine percent of respondents said they would write letters or cards this year .
In 2020 , humanity 's carbon footprint accounted for 74 percent of the global ecological footprint . This statistic illustrates the share of each land use in the global ecological footprint in 2020 .

According to the survey conducted in 2020 , most of the Polish cosmetic companies stated that insufficient state support could cause some restrictions on their activities . However , only one percent of respondents said that it could lead to business closure .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has had a significant impact on the European telecommunications sector . The forecast for capital expenditure in the sector is expected to decrease from 100 billion euros in 2019 to 96 billion euros by 2023 , with the lower case scenario showing a further decline to 91 billion euros .

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. adults who had flu vaccinations from 2009 to 2018 , by age . In 2018 , around 34.2 percent of adults aged between 18 and 49 years in the United States had flu vaccinations .

This statistic displays the share of U.S. adults who had flu vaccinations from 2009 to 2018 , by race/ethnicity . In 2018 , around 47 percent of white adults in the United States had received a flu vaccination .

In Sweden , 12 percent of men and 12 percent of women believed that they were very likely to contract COVID-19 . In total , 35 percent of respondents stated that they neither believed it was likely nor unlikely that they would contract the virus .

As of December 2021 , New South Wales had administered over six million doses of COVID-19 vaccines to its residents . Victoria was second with over five million doses administered . The number of first and second doses administered in Australia increased significantly since the beginning of 2021 .

This statistic displays the share of smokers in select countries who made an attempt to quit smoking as of 2019 . According to the data , 48 percent of smokers in Norway had attempted to quit smoking in the past year .

As of November 2020 , around 42 percent of respondents in the United Kingdom ( UK ) stated that they were very likely to take a coronavirus vaccine if one was available . This statistic shows the likeliness to take a coronavirus vaccine in the UK as of November 2020 , by age .
In 2020 , exports of plywood in Morocco amounted to approximately 24 thousand cubic meters . This was a decrease from the previous year , when exports reached nearly 48 thousand cubic meters .

This statistic shows the carbon intensity outlook of the power sector in Ireland from 2020 to 2050 . It is forecast that by 2030 , the carbon intensity of the Irish power sector will decrease to 124 grams of CO2 per kilowatt-hour .

This statistic shows the forecasted installed nameplate energy capacity in Germany in 2040 , by energy source . It is expected that solar power will have an installed capacity of 120 gigawatts by 2040 .

This statistic shows the forecasted installed nameplate energy capacity in Australia in 2050 , by energy source . It is expected that solar power will have an installed capacity of 30.4 gigawatts by 2050 .

As of November 2020 , 39 percent of respondents in the United Kingdom ( UK ) strongly supported the idea of banning people from posting conspiracy theories about the coronavirus vaccine online . A further 25 percent tended to support this measure .
The average Wi-Fi network connection speed in North America was 46.2 Mbps as of December 2018 . This figure is expected to grow to 109.5 Mbps by 2023 .
In 2021 , Roblox Corporation generated a net loss of approximately 495 million U.S. dollars . The company 's net loss increased significantly in 2020 and 2021 compared to previous years .

As of March 11 , 2020 , around 36 percent of U.S. adults aged between 18 and 29 years believed that most people were overreacting to the actual risks posed by COVID-19 . In comparison , only 24 percent of those aged 65 years and older shared this view .

In 2019 , Roblox Corporation generated over 483 million U.S. dollars in bookings from its games in the United States and Canada . The company 's global bookings amounted to approximately 675 million U.S. dollars that year .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a significant impact on online searches in the financial service industry in the United States between March and August 2020 . During this period , search volume for stocks increased by 240 percent compared to the same time period in 2019 .
This statistic presents the value of vegetable oils imported into Tunisia from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , imports of vegetable oils were valued at approximately 534 million Tunisian dinars .
This statistic shows the main exported services from Tanzania as of 2019 . In 2019 , the main export service from Tanzania was travel at approximately 2.63 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic presents the most searched product groups for Black Friday worldwide from November 2019 to October 2020 , by total number of searches . During the observed period , laptops were the most searched product group with a total of nearly 490 thousand searches .

As of September 2020 , Roblox games were most popular among children aged between nine and twelve years old . This statistic illustrates the distribution of Roblox games users worldwide as of September 2020 , sorted by age group .

This statistic shows the main barriers for young black people going into employment in the United Kingdom ( UK ) according to a survey conducted in 2020 . The most common barrier was bias or prejudice at the recruitment stage , with 54 percent of respondents saying this was a problem .

According to a survey conducted in Russia in April 2020 , before the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , half of the respondents bought cosmetics both online and at regular shops equally . Only one quarter of the respondents preferred buying cosmetics online .

As of September 2020 , Roblox games were played on mobile devices by 79 percent of users worldwide . The social gaming platform is popular among children and teenagers , with over 45 million active daily users as of that time .

This statistic displays the percentage of office-based U.S. physicians who had computerized capability to identify patients due for preventive or follow-up care in 2017 , by specialty . In that year , 54.8 percent of U.S. physicians practicing surgical care reported having this capability .

As of 2021 , veterans were more likely to say that VA health care was generally better than general health care in the United States . However , households were more likely to say that VA health care was generally worse than general health care .

This statistic displays the percentage of office-based U.S. physicians who had computerized capability to identify patients due for preventive or follow-up care in 2017 , by practice size . In that year , around 65 percent of all physicians had such capability .
This statistic shows the sales volume of turbot in Spain from 2008 to 2020 . In 2020 , the sales volume of turbot amounted to approximately 6,947 tons .
This statistic shows the annual sales volume of European plaice in Spain from 2008 to 2020 . In 2020 , the sales volume of European plaice amounted to approximately 701 tons .

As of March 6 , 2022 , South Africa was the country with the highest number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in Southern Africa . The total number of confirmed cases amounted to approximately 3.7 million . In comparison , Lesotho had around 25,000 confirmed cases .

This statistic shows the share of U.S. adults who knew stroke signs and how to respond as of 2017 , by age . During the survey , 95 percent of respondents aged 45 to 64 years old stated that they knew the sign `` face , arm , leg , side numbness '' .

This statistic shows the leading pulp and paper companies worldwide based on number of countries with operations as of 2019 . Kimberly-Clark Corp was the leading company in this sector , operating in 38 different countries around the world .

In 2021 , 82 percent of professional investors worldwide stated that they were increasing their ESG investments . This statistic illustrates the share of professional investors who increased their ESG investments in 2020 and 2021 .

According to a survey conducted in Russia in 2020 , rock was the most popular genre among respondents aged between 18 and 24 years . Pop songs were the second most popular genre among this age group . The least popular genre among young people was operetta .

According to a survey conducted in Russia in 2020 , more women than men play musical instruments . The most popular instrument among Russian women was the piano , with 14 percent of respondents playing it . Among men , the most common instrument was the guitar .

This statistic shows the share of consumers purchasing sustainable gifts for Christmas in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020 , by age . In this year , 48 percent of respondents aged between 18 and 24 years stated that they purchased sustainable gifts for Christmas .
